location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Ajmer to Donald Robertson

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Robertson's recent illness which has caused him to have to leave Rajpootana [Rājasthān] and finding an appointment which would be more agreeable for his health.The letter also discusses the Government's decision to employ officers to handle boundary settlement disputes.
